imgDesc.text:
Within these ruins, there are strange, water-colored energy flows, that seem to follow established "channels" as they flow along.
Additionally, there are devices on the tracks that can gather these energy flows. These strange devices can even use <color=#ffe14b>lifts</color> to transfer these flows to high or lower-level "channels." The final goal seems to be to guide this energy into the <color=#ffe14b>large machine in the middle</color> of the ruins.
